complaint_text: My Speed Post article (EM987654321IN) sent from Dadar H.O. to Kolkata has been stuck at the sorting hub for 12 days.
The consignment booked for Delhi is delayed by over a week. Urgent documents are inside.
I booked a registered parcel from Andheri East to Pune last Monday, but it has not reached yet.
It has been 10 days since I sent the Rakhi to Jaipur. The status still shows 'In Transit'.
My parcel from Bengaluru GPO to Mysuru is delayed. I need it for a wedding function.
Why does India Post take so long to deliver from Mumbai to Goa? It has been 15 days.
The speed post containing my passport has not arrived. It was dispatched 5 days ago.
Delay in delivery of my interview call letter. I might miss the interview date.
Package sent to Rural Bihar is stuck at the Patna sorting centre for 4 days.
I paid for Express Service, but the delivery is slower than ordinary post.
The article EM123456789IN was supposed to reach Chennai yesterday. No sign of it.
My medicine parcel from Hyderabad to Vijayawada is delayed. This is critical.
The tracking shows 'Item Bagged' at Delhi for the last 7 days. When will it move?
Posted a letter to the Income Tax office. It has not been delivered even after 2 weeks.
The admission form sent via Speed Post reached the university late. Who is responsible?
Consignment to Shillong is delaying indefinitely. Customer care is not helpful.
My packet from Kochi to Trivandrum is taking too long. It is just a 4-hour journey.
Delay in delivering the ATM card. The bank said it was dispatched on the 1st.
The parcel is looping between two sorting hubs in Mumbai. Please fix this.
Sent a gift to my sister in Lucknow. It missed her birthday due to this delay.
Why is the 'Next Day Delivery' taking 5 days? I want a refund of the speed post charges.
My consignment is stuck at the customs clearance in Delhi Foreign Post Office.
Sent a parcel to a soldier in Ladakh. It usually takes 10 days, but it has been a month.
The postman says he has too much load and will deliver my parcel next week. Unacceptable.
Article booked at Connaught Place H.O. has not moved for 7 days. Is the office closed?
My speed post to Ahmedabad is delayed. The tracking hasn't updated in 48 hours.
Urgent legal notice sent to High Court is delayed. This will cause me a huge loss.
The packet sent to Bhubaneswar is still in Kolkata. Why the delay?
I am waiting for my PAN card delivery. It has been 'Item Bagged' for 96 hours.
Dispatched a parcel to Indore. It is still showing 'Booked' after 5 days.
The delivery of my cheque book is delayed. I cannot withdraw money.
Parcel to Chandigarh is stuck. I went to the PO and they said wait for 2 more days.
My registered letter to the bank is delayed. I will be charged a penalty.
Speed post to Bhopal is late. It should have been delivered by now.
The package arrived at the local PO but was not delivered. Now it is the weekend.
Delay in delivery of educational certificates. I need them for counseling.
My consignment to Surat is delayed. Tracking says 'Misrouted'.
Sent a parcel to Ranchi. It has been 12 days and no update.
The article to Dehradun is stuck at the Delhi hub. Please expedite.
My parcel to Vadodara is delayed. This is very poor service.
Waiting for a parcel from my parents in Kerala. It has been 2 weeks.
The speed post to Amritsar is late. Tracking shows no movement.
Delay in delivery of a gift to my friend in Pune. Very disappointing.
My parcel to Nagpur is stuck. The post office is not answering calls.
The consignment to Visakhapatnam is delayed. I filed a complaint but no response.
Speed post to Jodhpur is late. It contains perishable items.
My letter to the editor is delayed. The issue is no longer relevant.
Parcel to Coimbatore is stuck at Chennai. Please help.
Delay in delivery of a book packet. Exams are starting soon.
The registered post to Varanasi is late. It has been 8 days.
My parcel from Delhi to Shimla seems to have vanished. Tracking stopped 20 days ago.
I sent a gift to Guwahati (Ref: RN123456789IN). Status says 'Delivered' but nothing arrived.
My package containing a mobile phone is missing. The post office says they can't find it.
Registered letter to Mumbai Income Tax office never reached. I am facing a penalty.
I booked a consignment from Kochi. It never arrived. Complaint filed but no response.
My article to Shillong is lost in transit. Helpline 1924 is useless.
Sent property documents to Ahmedabad. The packet is untraceable. This is negligence.
I sent a money order to my village. It has been 2 months and the record is lost.
Consignment stuck at 'Bag Opened' for 3 weeks. I fear it is stolen.
Article marked as 'Delivered' to a stranger. My parcel is effectively lost.
My Speed Post article containing a watch is missing. Compensation offered is too low.
The parcel with my original degree certificate is lost. How can I replace it?
Sent 5kg of sweets to my son. The parcel never reached the destination.
My cheque book sent by the bank is lost. I am worried about fraud.
The post office says they cannot find my parcel in their godown. Tracking shows it is there.
Article lost between two sorting hubs. Dispatched from A, never reached B.
My PLI policy document sent via post is lost. Getting a duplicate is a hassle.
Sent a return parcel to Amazon via India Post. Amazon says they never received it.
Courier to Andaman Nicobar is lost. No updates after Kolkata.
The entire bag of mail containing my letter was lost in an accident. I need compensation.
My passport was dispatched by the RPO but India Post has lost it.
Parcel containing clothes for my newborn is lost. It has been 45 days.
I suspect pilferage at the sorting centre. My parcel arrived empty.
The status says 'Disposed'. How can you dispose of my property?
My registered parcel to Pune is missing. Visited the PO 5 times, no clue.
Sent a laptop charger to Bangalore. It never reached. Tracking is invalid.
My consignment of books is lost. I need them for my studies.
The parcel sent to Jaipur is missing. It had expensive items.
My letter to the Prime Minister's office is lost. This is unacceptable.
Sent a Rakhi to my brother. It was lost and never delivered.
My parcel to Hyderabad is untraceable. The status has not changed in a month.
The consignment to Chennai is lost. I want a full refund.
My speed post to Kolkata is missing. The tracking number does not exist.
Sent a gift to my friend in Delhi. It never arrived.
My parcel to Lucknow is lost. The postmaster is not helpful.
The article to Patna is missing. I have lost hope of finding it.
My consignment to Bhopal is lost. Tracking shows 'Record Not Found'.
Sent a parcel to Indore. It is missing. Please investigate.
My registered post to Surat is lost. It contained important papers.
The packet to Nagpur is missing. I demand an inquiry.
My parcel to Kanpur is lost. This is very poor service.
Sent a letter to the bank. It was lost. Now my account is frozen.
My consignment to Vadodara is missing. I am very frustrated.
The parcel to Visakhapatnam is lost. I filed an RTI but no reply.
My speed post to Ludhiana is missing. It had my driving license.
Sent a parcel to Agra. It never reached. Where is it?
My article to Nashik is lost. Tracking stopped at Mumbai.
The consignment to Meerut is missing. Please find it.
My parcel to Rajkot is lost. I will sue the department.
Sent a parcel to Varanasi. It is missing. Tracking says 'In Transit' forever.
Received my parcel from Amazon via India Post. The outer box was crushed.
I sent a jar of pickles. Despite marking 'Fragile', it was smashed.
The book packet was torn open. Several pages are wet and ruined.
My laptop charger arrived bent. Packaging was very poor.
Received a damaged envelope. Important certificates inside were creased.
The Rakhi envelope was torn and the Rakhi was missing. Only empty envelope delivered.
Electronic item reached Lucknow in pieces. The box was crushed.
My medicine parcel was left in the rain. The medicines are spoiled.
The corner of the parcel was bitten by rats. Unhygienic storage.
Received a framed photo with shattered glass. I want to claim insurance.
My degree certificate arrived folded, despite 'Do Not Fold' instruction.
The outer box was destroyed. Looks like it was thrown from a vehicle.
Sent dry fruits. The packet was torn and contents spilled.
The delivered item is scratched and dented. Happened during transit.
The customized gift is ruined. The painting corner is ripped.
Received a parcel covered in dust and dirt. Contents are soiled.
The plastic container inside cracked due to heavy pressure.
My medicine bottle was broken. Glass shards mixed with pills.
The decorative beads on the Rakhi were crushed. Very careless handling.
The book cover is ripped. Caught in a sorting machine?
The package arrived open. Adhesive tape was removed.
My headphones are broken. One side is not working after crushing.
The collectible coin set arrived with a cracked display case.
The saree has oil stains from another damaged parcel.
Wedding invitation cards were bent at the corners. Unprofessional.
My parcel containing snacks was crushed. It is now powder.
The gift box was dented. It looks terrible.
My cosmetics parcel arrived broken. The lotion leaked everywhere.
The toy I sent to my nephew is broken. He is crying.
My watch arrived with a cracked screen. It was packed well.
The ceramic mug I ordered is verified broken. I need a replacement.
My parcel was wet. The clothes inside smell of mildew.
The musical instrument arrived damaged. The strings are snapped.
My painting was bent. The canvas is ruined.
The jewellery box was crushed. The latch is broken.
My spectacles arrived with a broken frame. I can't see.
The flower vase is shattered. It was a gift.
My calculator is damaged. The screen is black.
The perfume bottle broke. The whole parcel smells strong.
My hard drive arrived damaged. It is making a clicking sound.
The shoes were crushed. They are out of shape.
My mobile screen guard arrived cracked. Useless now.
The wall clock is broken. The glass is shattered.
My seeds packet was torn. Seeds leaked out.
The kitchen appliance arrived dented. It is not working.
My stationery parcel was wet. The notebooks are ruined.
The candles I sent melted. They were kept in a hot place.
My chocolate parcel was crushed. It is a mess.
The handicraft item is broken. It was very delicate.
My parcel looks like it was stepped on. Everything inside is flat.
The parcel was delivered to a neighbor. I did not authorize this.
Status says 'Delivered' but I was home and no one came.
My letter went to the wrong pin code. Addressed to 400001, went to 400051.
The postman gave my registered post to a shopkeeper. Privacy violation.
I received a parcel meant for 'Rahul'. I had to return it.
Delivered to the wrong address. Signature on POD is not mine.
The postman threw the letter in the wrong house. Neighbor gave it to me.
Delivered to 'Security' but my building has no guard. Who has it?
My speed post went to my old address despite redirection request.
Package delivered to office reception on Sunday. Now it is missing.
My parcel was delivered to Flat 401 instead of 402.
The postman confused my address with a similar street name.
Delivered to a family member who doesn't live with me. I asked for personal delivery.
Article sent to the wrong city due to sorting error.
Delivered to the Watchman. He denies taking it.
My interview letter was delivered to a house two blocks away.
Postman marked 'Delivered' but kept it to deliver next day.
Wrong delivery of legal notice. It went to the opposite party!
Parcel left at the door. Anyone could have stolen it.
Delivered to 'Ramesh'. There is no Ramesh here.
My refund cheque was delivered to the wrong address.
Postman gave parcel to a kid playing outside. No signature taken.
I keep getting mail for the previous tenant. Please stop.
My parcel was delivered to a nearby shop. I have to go collect it.
Delivered to the wrong floor. I found it on the stairs.
My credit card was delivered to the wrong person. Security risk!
The postman dropped the letter in the wrong letterbox.
Delivered to a commercial address instead of residential.
My parcel was handed to a stranger on the street.
The tracking says delivered to [City A] but I live in.
Delivered to the wrong block in the society.
My passport was delivered to my neighbor. This is illegal.
The postman mixed up the parcels. I got someone else's.
Delivered to the wrong wing of the apartment complex.
My parcel was left with the gardener. He forgot to give it to me.
Delivered to the wrong office cabin. My colleague found it.
The postman gave it to the maid next door. She lost it.
Delivered to the wrong hostel room number.
My confidential letter was given to the receptionist.
Delivered to the wrong plot number in the colony.
My parcel was left at the gate. It rained and got wet.
Delivered to the wrong village with the same name.
My magazine subscription is going to the wrong house.
Delivered to a person with the same name but different address.
The postman dropped the parcel in the wrong compound.
Delivered to the wrong school. My son didn't get it.
My appointment letter was delivered to the wrong flat.
Delivered to the wrong shop in the market.
My parcel was left on the porch of the wrong house.
Delivered to the wrong relative. I have to go get it.
The tracking website is useless. 'Item Booked' for 5 days.
I can't track my consignment EW556677889IN. 'Invalid Number'.
Tracking is confusing. Delhi -> Mumbai -> Delhi -> Nagpur?
Mobile tracking page keeps timing out. I need status.
SMS said 'Out for Delivery' at 9 AM. Now 8 PM, status 'Insufficient Address'.
Server is always down. 'System Busy'. How to track?
Tracking says 'Door Locked' but I was home. Postman is lying.
No updates for international shipment after Mumbai Foreign Post Office.
Tracking shows 'Delivered' but not to whom or where.
Status says 'Disposed'. What does that mean?
Website is down for 48 hours. Cannot track urgent parcel.
Enter Consignment Number says 'No Record Found'. I have receipt.
Status not changed from 'Booked' for 10 days.
Website is slow. Times out before loading.
Status says 'Out for Delivery' at 10 PM. Fake update.
SMS says delivered, online says 'In Transit'. Which is true?
CAPTCHA on tracking page keeps failing.
No update after 'Item Dispatched from India'. Been a month.
Mobile app crashes when tracking speed post.
Cannot see destination PIN code in tracking. Wrong place?
Status 'Insufficient Address' but no one called.
SMS alerts not coming. Have to check website manually.
Tracking history shows future dates? System glitch.
Unable to track Money Order online.
Tracking number on receipt is illegible.
Status 'Item On Hold' but no reason given.
Tracking link in SMS does not open.
Parcel arrived but tracking says 'Pending'. Not real-time.
Customer care sees same details as website. Useless.
Tracking shows 'Redirected' but not where.
Track N Trace unavailable due to maintenance.
Cannot download Proof of Delivery.
Tracking says 'Customs Hold' for too long.
Status 'Return to Sender' without delivery attempt.
Tracking shows 'Undelivered' but no reason.
No tracking for ordinary post. How to find it?
Tracking says 'Delivered' at 2 AM. Impossible.
Status 'Item Received' at same location 3 times.
Tracking shows 'Bagged' but not 'Dispatched'.
Cannot track PLI status online.
Tracking says 'Addressee Left'. I am still here.
Status 'Unclaimed' but I never got notice.
Tracking map is not loading.
Status 'Item Misplaced' then 'Found'. Very confusing.
Tracking shows wrong weight of parcel.
Status 'Delivered' but date is wrong.
Tracking says 'Attempted' but no intimation slip.
Cannot track VPP parcel.
Tracking interface is not user friendly.
Status 'Item Lost' appeared then disappeared.
Waiting for refund of failed money order for 3 months.
Insured parcel lost. Offering Rs. 500 instead of Rs. 5000.
Charged double for weight. Scale faulty. Want refund.
COD collected but not credited to my account. 15 days passed.
Cancelled PLI policy. Surrender value not received.
Double deduction for Sukanya Samriddhi. Refund extra.
Want compensation for mental harassment due to delay.
Parcel damaged. Insurance claim process too complicated.
Deposit in RD not reflecting. Need money back or credit.
Lost speed post. Want refund of booking amount + compensation.
Cancelled Money Order. When will I get money back?
Speed post delayed by 10 days. Entitled to refund.
Double deduction for stamp online. Refund Rs. 500.
Compensation check bounced. This is harassment.
Penalty deducted without notice. Refund it.
Parcel damaged. Want declared value, not just postage.
Paid for service I didn't get. Full refund needed.
Postmaster asking bribe for refund cheque.
Deposit in savings account not reflecting. Where is money?
Sent 3 reminders for claim. No reply.
Insurance claim rejected citing silly reasons.
Refund for failed IPPB transaction not reversed.
Lost international parcel. Compensation in Rupees, paid in Dollars.
Senior citizen. Can't run for Rs. 200 refund. Credit account.
Department denies 'consequential loss'. I lost contract.
MO returned unpaid, commission deducted. Want full back.
Refund for cancelled stamp order pending.
Wrongly charged for customs duty. Need refund.
Compensation for lost passport is too low.
Refund for failed bill payment via post office.
Extra charge for packaging not provided. Refund.
Claim pending for 6 months. No update.
Refund for damaged electronic item denied.
Interest on KVP not paid correctly. Need difference.
Refund for lost registered letter refused.
Charged for door delivery, had to collect. Refund.
Compensation for torn books is insufficient.
Refund for duplicate transaction failed.
Claim form lost by office. Have to file again.
Refund for late delivery of express parcel.
Compensation for broken glass item rejected.
Refund for cancelled RD account delayed.
Wrong interest rate applied. Refund difference.
Compensation for lost gift parcel pending.
Refund for failed recharge at PO counter.
Charged for insurance but not covered. Refund.
Compensation for spoiled food item denied.
Refund for lost cheque book charges.
Claim settlement taking too long.
Refund amount credited to wrong account.
Civil Lines staff rude. Shouted for no change.
Clerk made me wait 45 mins while chatting on phone.
Postmaster refused parcel saying 'too big'. It was within limits.
Arrogant staff at speed post counter. Threw receipt.
Postman demands 'tip' for passport delivery. Threatens non-delivery.
Counter shut at 3 PM. Official time is 4 PM.
Guard rude. Didn't let me park bike.
Aadhaar counter employee asking for bribe.
No one picks up customer care phone. Staff ignores.
Postman threw mail on floor. Unprofessional.
Andheri East staff rude. Shouted for asking pen.
Clerk refused booking at 3:30 PM. Watching videos.
Staff shuts counter for lunch 1-2:30. Limit is 30 mins.
Official made me wait 1 hour while chatting.
Postmaster arrogant. Refused to listen to grievance.
Lady at Aadhaar counter rude to elderly.
Staff refused complaint book. Threatened ban.
Delivery agent threw parcel at gate.
Staff refused Rs. 10 coin. Said 'not valid'.
Clerk never has change. Forces to buy stamps.
Staff eating lunch at counter. Said come later.
Postman smells of alcohol.
Employee refused to help illiterate person.
Staff keeps fan for themselves. Customer area hot.
Staff mocked me for asking tracking questions.
Enquiry window empty. Waited 45 mins.
Postman refused to come to 3rd floor.
Gates closed 15 mins early.
Staff not trained. Don't know international rules.
Clerk made address error. Blamed me.
Discriminatory behavior. Attends known people first.
Postman speaks rudely if asked why late.
Branch manager hung up on me.
Staff busy on personal calls. Line long.
Postman asks for Diwali bonus aggressively.
Clerk yelled at me for not having glue.
Staff refused to weigh parcel. Guessed weight.
Postmaster is always absent.
Guard pushed me out at closing time.
Staff lost my form. Asked to fill again.
Clerk refused to accept damaged note.
Postman comes at odd hours.
Staff refused to give receipt.
Employee sleeping at counter.
Staff arguing loudly with each other.
Postman refuses to check ID.
Clerk gave wrong information.
Staff refused to acknowledge delivery.
Postman makes me sign blank paper.
Staff very slow. One transaction takes 20 mins.
Thank you for the quick delivery, very happy.
Great service by the postman today.
Received my parcel on time, good job India Post.
Excellent service and polite staff.
Very fast delivery of my speed post.
Keep up the good work.
Appreciate the timely response.
My passport arrived earlier than expected.
Good experience with the tracking system.
Post office staff was very helpful.
Satisfied with the resolution provided.
Best service I have received recently.
